The shaman makes an extra attack of opportunity each round. This ability stacks with the attacks of opportunity granted by the @Compendium[pf1.feats.h9nHYLxXvIXBTmup]{Combat Reflexes} feat.

At 8th level, the shaman gains the @Compendium[pf1.feats.YLCvMNeAF9V31m1h]{Weapon Specialization} feat in a weapon of her choice as a bonus feat.

At 16th level, the shaman gains the @Compendium[pf1.feats.IER2MzJrjSvxMlNS]{Greater Weapon Focus} feat as a bonus feat, for the same weapon chosen for Weapon Specialization. The shaman doesnâ€™t need to meet the prerequisites of these feats.
